Serverless
Endpoints
Manage Endpoints
On this page
Manage Endpoints
Learn to manage Severless Endpoints.
Create an Endpoint
You can create an Endpoint in the Web interface.
1. Navigate to Serverless Endpoints.
2. Select + New Endpoint and enter the following:
i. Endpoint Name.
ii. Select your GPUs.
iii. Conﬁgure your workers.
iv. Add a container image.
v. Select Deploy.
Delete an Endpoint
You can delete an Endpoint in the Web interface. Before an Endpoint can be deleted, all workers
must be removed.
1. Navigate to Serverless Endpoints.
2. Select the Endpoint you'd like to remove.
3. Select Edit Endpoint and set Max Workers to 0 .
4. Choose Update and then Delete Endpoint.
Edit an Endpoint
You can edit a running Endpoint in the Web interface after you've deployed it.
1. Navigate to Serverless Endpoints.
Ask AI
Ask AI
RunPod
2. Select the Endpoint you'd like to edit.
3. Select Edit Endpoint and make your changes.
4. Choose Update.
NOTE
You can force a conﬁguration update by setting Max Workers to 0, selecting Update, then
updating your max workers back to your needed value.
